column1: ,Themperror,2012-11-03T18:31Z,"For the ones that don't know, To install these you NEED a cracked Rocksmith..(This does not work on the legit/retail one)
The Content folder goes in your Rocksmith folder
(or all the .dat files in your Content folder IN the rocksmith folder)"

,godfitzham7,2012-11-03T19:54Z,"Themperror, there was a guy called DCrack who was a Champion with making available flightsimulator downloads on TPB, but YOU are The KING in my opinion with these RS DLCs !!! THANK YOU, thank you very much."

,ChocoboDreams,2012-11-04T14:12Z,"So my game has been messing up ever since replacing my old ""Content"" folder with this one (the old one was pretty much your 40 pack released before this one, which worked fine). Ever since downloading this, my game has crashed, gotten stuck on the loading screen, and when I do manage to make it into the game, it doesn't detect my cable (a problem I haven't had at all since the game was released here on Pirate Bay). "

Sam here, I got the songs little by little from the Thread on CS_RIN_RU and I have the same bugs since two days. One of the songs (at least) seems to be corrupted in some way and messing the game up sometimes."

,korosiv,2012-11-04T16:04Z,"@ChocoboDreams   or other who experienced trouble with that   , delete the file called      RS001TSPK0000004.dat      in your content folder propably a mess with the "" time cheater (saver) Pack""  delete this file and it will work "
